comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: The book is damn great, and it must have comprised great content too, as I only went through the first few pages. You are doing some hard work here. But just to be honest, currently no one really has that much time to read the original BTC whitepaper, so why did they read your 256-page book? I am not saying your efforts are wasted. Instead, currently, BTC has not gotten as much reputation as the old political leaders did, and now we are reading about them in history books. But BTC is still new and exists, and like other things that exist and are alive, the traffic on such history books will be lower when the right time comes, like in 2140 (when the mining will be done).Then people will talk about your book and praise you, and they might donate to you, so the address you are using for donations means you must give access to it to your upcoming generations. (As the chances for us to stay alive for 2140 seem difficult, I hope you won't mind my words.
